opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
NIX, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this ease.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Roslyn M. Litman, Martha S. Helmreich, Pittsburgh, for Red Sky, Inc. t/a Payless for Beer & Pop Everyday.
Stanley J. Wolowski, Richard Parker, Pittsburgh, for Bureau of Liquor Control Enforcement.

RED SKY, INC., t/a Payless for Beer & Pop Everyday, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, BUREAU OF LIQUOR CONTROL ENFORCEMENT, Appellee. BEER & POP WAREHOUSE, INC., Appellant, v.
